Effect: Archon's Protection.name: Effect: Archon's Protection
Effect: Archon's Protection.description: You gain resistance to all damage against the triggering damage.

Effect: Armament of the Archons.name: Effect: Armament of the Archons
Effect: Armament of the Archons.description: You gain an Arqsheth Strike. It is a martial ranged weapon that deals 2d10 fire damage; is in the laser group; has a range increment of 40 feet; and has the analog, holy, and tracking +2 traits. Strikes made with this weapon deal an extra 1d10 spirit damage.

Effect: Assess Target.name: Effect: Assess Target
Effect: Assess Target.description: You deal an additional 1d8 damage with your reality ripper against the marked target and increase the range increment of your reality ripper to 80 feet.

Effect: Attunement Aura (Graviton-Attune.name: Effect: Attunement Aura (Graviton-Attuned)
Effect: Attunement Aura (Graviton-Attune.description: You take a –5-foot status penalty to Speeds.

Effect: Attunement Aura (Photon-Attuned).name: Effect: Attunement Aura (Photon-Attuned)
Effect: Attunement Aura (Photon-Attuned).description: You gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speeds.

Effect: Colony Mind.name: Effect: Colony Mind
Effect: Colony Mind.description: When you roll a success on a save against a mental effect, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Coordinated Fire.name: Effect: Coordinated Fire
Effect: Coordinated Fire.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll.

Effect: Divine Farewell.name: Effect: Divine Farewell
Effect: Divine Farewell.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC and saving throws against attacks and effects from creatures and hazards with the unholy trait.

Effect: Encouraging Hope (Allies).name: Effect: Encouraging Hope (Allies)
Effect: Encouraging Hope (Allies).description: You gain a +1 status bonus to all saves against emotion and mental effects.

Effect: Encouraging Hope (Enemies).name: Effect: Encouraging Hope (Enemies)
Effect: Encouraging Hope (Enemies).description: You take a –1 status penalty to all saves against emotion and mental effects.

Effect: Engulf and Swallow Whole.name: Effect: Engulf and Swallow Whole
Effect: Engulf and Swallow Whole.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]{Engulf} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu]{Swallow Whole}

You are grabbed, slowed 1, and you have to hold your breath or start suffocating. You can only attack the origin with unarmed attacks or with weapons of light Bulk or less, and the origin is off-guard against the attack. If the origin takes piercing or slashing damage equaling or exceeding the listed Rupture value from a single attack or spell, you cut yourself free.

Effect: Follicle Germination.name: Effect: Follicle Germination
Effect: Follicle Germination.description: Corzadais gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls against you.

Effect: Gremlin's Gift.name: Effect: Gremlin's Gift
Effect: Gremlin's Gift.description: You gain +2 status bonus to checks with the chosen skill.

Effect: Gremlin's Inverted Gift.name: Effect: Gremlin's Inverted Gift
Effect: Gremlin's Inverted Gift.description: You gain –4 status penalty to checks with the chosen skill.

Effect: Input Overload Aura.name: Effect: Input Overload Aura
Effect: Input Overload Aura.description: Take a –1 status penalty to AC and all saves against sonic effects or effects that alter written or stored data. When attempting to read a document you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or you cannot read the document for the next 1d4+1 rounds.

Effect: Interstellar Raft.name: Effect: Interstellar Raft
Effect: Interstellar Raft.description: You gain a 40-foot fly Speed and the cosmic trait.

Effect: Lead the Charge.name: Effect: Lead the Charge
Effect: Lead the Charge.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the marked target.

Effect: Natural Thruster.name: Effect: Natural Thruster
Effect: Natural Thruster.description: You gain a +75-foot status bonus to your fly Speed and deal an additional 1d10 slashing damage with your tail Strikes.

Effect: Rallied by the Beasts.name: Effect: Rallied by the Beasts
Effect: Rallied by the Beasts.description: You gain 10 temporary Hit Points and deal an additional 1d6 precision damage with your melee strikes.

Effect: Resonance.name: Effect: Resonance
Effect: Resonance.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for effects with the selected trait; a creature with the elemental and selected traits gains this bonus to all attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Scoring.name: Effect: Scoring
Effect: Scoring.description: Your tail gains the following traits: deadly d4, hampering, and razing

Effect: Seep In.name: Effect: Seep In
Effect: Seep In.description:
You gain an effect depending on the nature of the damage.

  • Energy Damage Your attacks deal an additional 2d6 damage of the same type as the energy damage dealt to you.

  • Physical Damage You gain resistance 6 to physical damage. If the damage was dealt by a weapon made of a special material, such as silver, your battering sludge Strike counts as that same material for the duration of the effect.

Effect: Self-Destructive Frenzy.name: Effect: Self-Destructive Frenzy
Effect: Self-Destructive Frenzy.description: You become confused and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls, and a –2 circumstance penalty to AC.

Effect: Sharpshooter.name: Effect: Sharpshooter
Effect: Sharpshooter.description: Your AC bonus from lesser or standard cover is reduced by 1.

Effect: Shoot to Kill.name: Effect: Shoot to Kill
Effect: Shoot to Kill.description: You take a –1 circumstance penalty to your AC.

Effect: Siphon Poison.name: Effect: Siphon Poison
Effect: Siphon Poison.description: The acid damage die size for your mandibles and acid spit Strikes and Sickening Death ability increase by one step.
